meanings.definition: An organism, especially a fungus or bacterium, that lives on dead or decaying organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The saprophyte helped break down the fallen leaves in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The saprophyte thrived in the compost pile, feeding on the decaying vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The saprophyte threw a party on the rotting log, inviting all its decomposer friends.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny janitor, the saprophyte cleaned up the mess of organic matter on the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: The saprophyte was like a recycling superhero, turning dead plants into nutrients for the soil.
